## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G27160](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G27160)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>bS21c, GHS1, LPE2, RPS21</u>
- **Gene Name:** Ribosomal Protein bS21c, GLUCOSE HYPERSENSITIVE 1, LOW PHOTOSYNTHETIC EFFICIENCY2
- **Description:**   Ribosomal protein S21 family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2095143
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_077692]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Lower abundance of PSII, PSI, Cytb6/f, and ATPase complex. The effect of high C and low N on plant growth was much less severe.
